name: Villager comes alive
description:
The Gameplay :
- You play as a villager king, which builds up his own villager and expanding it(Villager should be able to bread in future)
- You gathering resources as wood, coal, iron, gold, diamond and corn/pumpkins from farmfields and with these you can buy
new intems/props/buildings in shop and the corn & pumpkin do you harvest to make food out of it.
- The villagers in you village need food and you need to supply them with stuff(Which you put inside the chest, so the villagers can search/take it to be able to do their jobs)

- The only job, which is currently available to deploy a village with, is the farmer, but it is planned to add the followed jobs later (Soldier, miner, lumberjack).

- There are currently no enemys in game, but zombies are planned to be added in the game soon !
